section.title: Tutorial: Create Markers for resources
section.para: Create a plug-in project "de.vogella.plugin.markers". Add the dependency to org.eclipse.core.resources", "org.eclipse.jdt.core" and "org.eclipse.jdt.ui". Create the command "de.vogella.plugin.markers.AddMarker" with the default handler AddMarkerHandler in the de.vogella.plugin.markers.handler class and add this command to the menu.
If you run, you can create a marker in the TODO list if you select a Java project and click your menu entry.
